name: KoGaMa - PC Servers for Mobile
description:
Problems with KoGaMa? Feeling confused when you and a friend enter the same world but can't find each other? Wanting to quit KoGaMa?!!

Have no fear! Here's a special gear!

We've noticed that when PC players and mobile players try to meet up in the same game world, they usually cannot. This is due to the fact that the mobile and PC versions use different servers for the same game worlds!

Ah, now this isn't to blame the dear developers of KoGaMa. This app is here to solve most of the miseries faced by players of all shapes and sizes. *grins*

This app allows you to connect to the PC servers and play alongside them with no extra worries!

Plus, if you're getting bored of KoGaMa, this app also has tabs for the KoGaMa Twitter and Facebook pages. Now you can be up-to-date with the latest news while playing or staying "in the lobby".

With love, Asenturisk Corporation.
